alert.note: Alert for Dauphin; Perry (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 3:00PM EDT until May 22 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Dauphin County in south central Pennsylvania... East central Perry County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 259 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Shermansdale, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Harrisburg, Colonial Park, Linglestown, Paxtonia, Skyline View, Marysville, Duncannon, New Buffalo, Rockville, Shermansdale, Penn National Race Course and Dehart Dam. This includes Interstate 81 near mile marker 66...and from mile markers 71 to 81. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
